name: C6
comment: The classic lap steel tuning. For C6 strings.

name: Leavitt tuning
comment: All intervals and a lot of jazz voicings

name: Reverse Leavitt
comment: What if we turn Leavitt around

name: Leavitt tuning (extra bass)
comment: All intervals and a lot of jazz voicings

name: Hexatonic
comment: A lot of chords, good for jazz. For C6 strings.

name: Hexatonic7
comment: One more minor third on top for straight dom7 chords

name: Another all-intervals mashup
comment: Leavitt tuning contains all intervals except the m2 and the octave. This one does too and has a bit more of the simpler chords. C6 strings, optionally with a thicker fifth string

name: Open G
comment: Open G. For regular guitar strings

name: Open E
comment: Same intervals as open G. For regular guitar strings

name: Open D
comment: Open D. For regular guitar strings

name: All fourths (P4)
comment: What if guitar was regularly tuned
